member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Numbers.Million(System.Int32)
member.summary: Multiplies a number by a million.
member.returns: The base number multiplied by a million.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Numbers.Million(System.Int64)
member.summary: Multiplies a number by a million.
member.returns: The base number multiplied by a million.

member.name: T:Darnton.Units.Speed
member.summary: The Speed class contains extension methods for converting from one sped unit or format to another. The base unit for conversions is metres per second.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Speed.FromMetresPerSecond(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts from metres per second to the base unit (metres per second). The identity conversion, used to make source units explicit in the code.
member.param: The speed in metres per second.
member.returns: The speed in metres per second.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Speed.FromMetresPerSecond(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Converts from metres per second to the base unit (metres per second). The identity conversion, used to make source units explicit in the code.
member.param: The speed in metres per second.
member.returns: The speed in metres per second.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Speed.ToKilometresPerHour(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Converts from metres per second to kilometres per hour.
member.param: The speed in metres per second.
member.returns: The speed in kilometres per hour.

member.name: T:Darnton.Units.Time
member.summary: The Time class contains extension methods for converting from one time unit or format to another. The base unit for conversions is the .NET tick, equal to 100 nanoseconds.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Time.FromSeconds(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts a time in seconds to the base unit (.NET ticks).

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Time.FromUnixTime(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts from a Unix timestamp to the base unit (.NET ticks).
member.param: The number of seconds since midnight on 1st January, 1970.
member.returns: The number of ticks represented by the timestamp.

member.name: M:Darnton.Units.Time.ToDateTimeOffset(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates a new DateTimeOffset structure representing the tick count.
member.param: The time zone offset in ticks. Defaults to zero, representing UTC.
